metadata.comment: Detects the usage of tsclient share to place a backdoor on the RDP source machine's startup folder

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('3') AND endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\mstsc.exe')) AND contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\microsoft\\windows\\start menu\\programs\\startup\\')))
